title: Game crashes when i try to open the crafting tab
body: So I recently got the 3 tokens needed to make a champ the lvl 7 mastery but when I go to open the crafting page the game crashes everytime.

replies.body: There's been an issue with the client crashing when opening hextech, and it may be due to a recent Windows update.  There may be other reasons that I'd like to rule out first.  If you have any third party apps like Play.tv or Overwolf as examples, try disabling them first.  Let me know if your issue persists after!
I have no third party apps running problem is still there and It happened before i updated windows
Not a huge deal just wondering if it was a reoccurring problem I'm sure it will be fixed soon
